00021 #ifndef COMPARABLE_H_
00022 #define COMPARABLE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 
00035 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00036 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00037 template<class T, class V>
00038 inline bool operator!=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00039     return !(lhs == rhs);
00040 }
00041 
00042 template<class T, class V>
00043 inline bool operator>(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00044     return !(lhs < rhs) && !(*lhs == rhs);
00045 }
00046 
00047 template<class T, class V>
00048 inline bool operator<=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00049     return (lhs < rhs) || (lhs == rhs);
00050 }
00051 
00052 template<class T, class V>
00053 inline bool operator>=(const T& lhs, const V& rhs) {
00054     return !(lhs < rhs);
00055 }
00056 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00057 
00058 #endif /* _COMPARABLE_H_ */
